name: Date Shouji!
description:
Step one: Be an exchange student on campus at UA. 

Step two: Meet the love of your life Shouji Mezou. 

Step three: ???

Step four: ... Profit?

This is a lighthearted visual novel/dating sim based on characters from Boku no Hero Academia by Kohei Horikoshi. It's rather cheesy,  only funny some of the time, and takes about fifteen minutes to play! Check it out if you like! 

Art, script and programming by jackiejonzz. 

Consider checking out my Twitter or supporting me on Kofi :)

SOUNDTRACK 

“I Noticed You” by Blanket Music (from freemusicarchive.org)

SFX 

"Bird Whistling, Single, Robin, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) (from Freesound.org)

"March Flies.flac" by guyburns (from Freesound.org)

"slow footsteps" by TheBuilder15 (from Freesound.org)

“Body falls into debris” by leonelmail (from Freesound.org)

Download instructions

Download the zip file-- you'll have to extract all, and then you can click on the Date Shouji application and it should work! 

Thanks for checking out my game!
